item.title: Learning Ruby Path
item.description: This was originally written in a Google Drive Document that was shared with a few people. However, I feel that it is time I “released” the document and shared it with anyone who wanted to learn Ruby the way I feel it should be learned. This isn’t going to be a tutorial like other sites, but more of a learning path, or guide to which documents, and ideas you should learn first.
